summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, dated August 2, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an inmate roster, and official count slips, recording inmate population counts and assignments. The primary significance is that it is a routine prison record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

persons.name: Tisdale
persons.context: Listed by name and registration number (78359-053) on the inmate roster form under the 'HOSP' (hospital) assignment category.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 761 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is dated August 2, 2019, which is the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, at the same facility.
The forms show a total inmate count of 761 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
One inmate named Tisdale (Reg No. 78359-053) is specifically listed on the roster with a 'HOSP' (hospital) assignment.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate population and assignments.
The records indicate routine prison operations, including out-count procedures and unit-based population tracking.
